content:
User: Preserve JSON Prompts: JSON-formatted prompts (like PURE_AI_LANGUAGE messages) are crucial for AI-AI communication. We’ll ensure these are kept intact, not treated as code to remove.

Grok: Assign Unique IDs: Each [JESSE PROMPT] and [GROK RESPONSE] will get a unique ID (e.g., prompt_001, response_001), making it easy to reference and tag.
